reviews.review_msg: Megan Barker was is my favourite prof at SFU. I managed to get a B in this course ONLY because her lectures were so chills. She made you like biology and gave so many examples. If you engage in lectures, do the readings (she tells you exactly what to read) you will do well in the course. BTW I got a C- in BISC 102 with a different prof. SHE DA BEST
